resources.string: Your note will be automatically saved when you press the back button
Create a new category by clicking the add a category\n button below
Start taking notes by clicking the add note\n button below
Notes needs to access your external storage to store data.
Notes will not work properly without permission to access the external storage.
Backed up notes were successfully restored.
This section has not been implemented for the beta version.

An elegant and hassle free way to create notes and categorize them. 

 App by Kelvin Kamau.
 ================================

 Get other apps by developer
 Reminders
 PingPong
 Pace2D
